successes.title: Underworld Ascendant
successes.description:
Join the original creators of Ultima Underworld on a 
quest to rekindle this legendary fantasy RPG series.

Pledges.description: Join us in the journey of creating the game! Get updates on progress + IRON BACKER BADGE for forum.

*KS EXCLUSIVE* in-game items: IRON AVATAR’S RING which glows when an enemy is nearby, and has the inscription “Remember to Buy the Game” + LITTLE FRIENDS claw knuckles + SLING WITH 8 PURPLE SPLATTER SEEDS + CHATTERING BART animated talking skull

PIONEER - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
 
All of the above, PLUS:
 
Digital copy of UNDERWORLD ASCENDANT (extra special low price) + Set of 3 beautiful digital WALLPAPERS + digital SOUNDTRACK + COPPER BACKER BADGE for forum.
 
*KS EXCLUSIVE* - In-game COPPER AVATAR’S RING which glows when an enemy is nearby.

PIONEER’s PROGENY
 
Everything from WANDERER level, PLUS:
 
Digital copy of UNDERWORLD ASCENDANT (special low price) + Set of 3 beautiful digital WALLPAPERS + digital SOUNDTRACK + COPPER BACKER BADGE for forum.
 
*KS EXCLUSIVE* - In-game COPPER AVATAR’S RING which glows when an enemy is nearby.
EARLY ACCESS to Beta build + Digital STRATEGY GUIDE + SILVER BACKER BADGE for forum.
*KS EXCLUSIVE* - In-game SILVER AVATAR’S RING which glows when an enemy is nearby.

EARLY ACCESS to alpha build + Digital copy of UNDERWORLD MAP suitable for printing + Digital download of MAKING OF UNDERWORLD ASCENDANT VIDEO + GOLD BACKER BADGE for forum, with EXCLUSIVE access to insider’s developer blog.
*KS EXCLUSIVE* - In-game GOLD AVATAR’S RING which glows red when an enemy is nearby, and green when a friend is close.

EARLY ACCESS to pre-alpha build + Digital GAME CONCEPT ART PORTFOLIO with design notes from the team + Digital copy of the ORIGINAL ULTIMA UNDERWORLD and ULTIMA UNDERWORLD II for the PC + Get for FREE any digital STRETCH GOAL item that gets unlocked.
*KS EXCLUSIVE* in-game items: Magic expanding ADVENTURER'S BACKPACK to lighten your load + ROTWORM SKIN BOOTS increase your speed while slogging through the Underswamp
